case.title: A public affair - 39
case.text:
Sex in restaurant bathrooms... in hotel telephone booths (they still exist)... in fire stairs... on fire escapes... under the Williamsburg Bridge in the East River Park... and, hottest and riskiest of all, against a wall on the street.
We've only just met... we hardly know each other's names... but the attraction is there and it's real. I push up your skirt. You slide down your panties. You're already wet...
If this turns you on, let's get together. I'm tall (well over six feet), handsome. Be pretty, please, with a good body. If we get spotted we don't want to ruin anybody's day...
